main event: An object was tracked on ground-radar for approximately 2 minutes in Ridgecrest, California, on January 29, 1952.
interesting points: The object appeared as a bright echo on ground radar,It suddenly faded and disappeared without any visual sightings,The sighting lasted for 2 minutes,Possible electronic interference was noted as a conclusion,No photographs were included with the report.
witness description: The report does not explicitly mention the witness's name but indicates that a form was filled out by an individual whose last name appears to be Cozatt.
